benchmark_details.name: CoSQA+ (Code Search Question Answering Plus)
benchmark_details.overview: CoSQA+ introduces a new multi-choice code search benchmark that pairs high-quality queries from CoSQA with multiple suitable code snippets, utilizing an automated annotation system with test-driven agents.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance code search evaluation by providing a multi-choice benchmark.

metrics: Normalized Discounted Cumulative Gain at rank 10 (NDCG@10)
methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on query-code pairs matched against ground truth annotations through empirical testing.
methodology.interpretation: Higher NDCG@10 and MRR indicate better performance in retrieving relevant code snippets.
methodology.baseline_results: CoSQA+ demonstrated superior quality over CoSQA in benchmarks.
methodology.validation: Rigorous validation using 400 randomly selected query-code pairs and test programs.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Informed consent obtained from human participants involved in the study.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: The dataset sources are publicly available under permissible licenses.
